fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Burn**: Set somebody on fire, roleblocking them(2 uses)
**Farm Powder**: Give the current head role one blaze powder.
**Levitate**: Attack somebody. All abilities against you fail this night(1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If you die, give the current head role two blaze powder.
-Whoever kills you is burned, they cannot use their ability the next night.
-If you die by lynching, scatter ashes across the town at 3 random players. -One person who visits these players tonight gets burned, being unable to use their ability the next night.
-You are roleblock immune
